title: What is the Roland Garros tennis schedule?
description: Roland Garros continues on Friday in Paris, where third-round action will begin. Defending champion Carlos Alcaraz and in-form Italian Lorenzo Musetti are among the stars who will be in action. View the full order of play for Friday here and see featured matches below.  Court Philippe-Chatrier From 12 p.m. [1] Aryna Sabalenka vs. Olga Danilovic [10] Holger Rune vs. Quentin Halys  [4] Jasmine Paolini vs. Yuliia Starodubtseva Night Session Not before 8:15 p.m. [5] Carlos Alcaraz vs. Damir Dzumhur Court Suzanne-Lenglen From 11 a.m. [8] Lorenzo Musetti vs. Mariano Navone [5] Iga Swiatek vs. Jaqueline Cristian [12] Elena Rybakina vs. [21] Jelena Ostapenko [15] Frances Tiafoe vs. [23] Sebastian Korda View Full Order Of Play Here [NEWSLETTER FORM]

Roland Garros

Alcaraz, Musetti in action Friday

May 30, 2025

Dimitar Dilkoff/AFP via Getty Images

Roland Garros runs from 25 May-8 June. By ATP Staff

Roland Garros continues on Friday in Paris, where third-round action will begin. Defending champion Carlos Alcaraz and in-form Italian Lorenzo Musetti are among the stars who will be in action.

View the full order of play for Friday here and see featured matches below. 

Court Philippe-Chatrier
From 12 p.m.
[1] Aryna Sabalenka vs. Olga Danilovic
[10] Holger Rune vs. Quentin Halys 
[4] Jasmine Paolini vs. Yuliia Starodubtseva

Night Session
Not before 8:15 p.m.
[5] Carlos Alcaraz vs. Damir Dzumhur

Court Suzanne-Lenglen
From 11 a.m.
[8] Lorenzo Musetti vs. Mariano Navone
[5] Iga Swiatek vs. Jaqueline Cristian
[12] Elena Rybakina vs. [21] Jelena Ostapenko
[15] Frances Tiafoe vs. [23] Sebastian Korda

View Full Order Of Play Here
